mapper.select: select favorite_id from sns_prj.user_has_favorite where user_id = #{user_id} order by favorite_id asc
select favorite_id from sns_prj.board_has_favorite where board_id = #{board_id} order by favorite_id asc

select favorite_name from `sns_prj`.`favorite` where favorite_id in ( select favorite_id from `sns_prj`.`board_has_favorite` where board_id in( select board_id from common_board where user_id = #{user_id} and board_id = #{board_id} ) )
mapper.delete: delete from sns_prj.`board_has_favorite` where board_id = (select board_id from common_board where user_id = #{user_id});
